entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 3:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: 43 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening then changing to rain overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
